text: The 1938 Washburn Ichabods football team represented Washburn University during the 1938 college football season. Washburn played their home games at the Moore Bowl in Topeka, Kansas. In their third year under head coach Elmer Holm, the Ichabods compiled a 6–3 record, and were 1–0 in the Missouri Valley Conference. ==Schedule== ==References== Washburn Category:Washburn Ichabods football seasons Washburn football
title: 1938 Washburn Ichabods football team
